Header: police constable nabbed over attempting to take bribe
Content: Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption has arrested a Police Constable who works attached to the Pelmadulla Police. He has been arrested due to attempting to take bribes. It has been reported that this police Constable has asked for a bribe amounting to Rs.6000 to drop a legal case against a Three Wheeler accident. The suspect has kept the National ID and the Driving License of the driver until the bribr is received. Later, the suspect has been arrested following a complaint made by the Three-Wheeler driver regarding the case.
